name: SummitSalonAcademy
0:
”Alexa, open summit's hair tip of the day”
”Alexa ask summit's hair tip of the day give me hair tip”
”Alexa, start summit's hair tip of the day”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: summit's hair tip of the day
des:
When you ask your Alexa or Google device for a hair tip, this app will play a random hair tip of the day brought to you by Summit Salon Academy - Portland.

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
